attributes.action: Help the country by firing A.Darling and then resigning himself, to allow some men of substance get us out of this crisis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Brown has dragged this country to its knees - both as 'prudent' Chancellor and now as a dithering PM. He of all people is responsible for our ills by wasting so much money - and not putting by for a rainy day.He believed his own hype that he was a financial giant. We now know he is a stunted giant - with feet of clay. He says he listens - save the uk, resign now and let an intelligent person run the uk - PLEASE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
